examples.example: 老师及时地通知了我们考试的时间和地点。

translate.english: The teacher informed us of the time and place of the exam in a timely manner.

examples.example: 公司提前通知大家周末有团建活动，让大家都很期待。

translate.english: The company informed everyone in advance that there will be a team-building activity on the weekend, which made everyone look forward to it.

examples.example: 社区工作人员及时通知居民们参加重要的会议。

translate.english: Community workers promptly informed the residents to attend the important meeting.
